info.name: Renren remove ADs 人人网去广告
info.description:
Remove ADs from pages of renren.com/xiaonei.com.  No other decoration would be done here so you can use this script with any other  enhancements as you like.

移除人人网（校内网）广告。不改动其他页面元素。
info.additionalInfo:
Rev 0.1 - 
    Hide .Widget (blog page), .Widget_flash (blog page), .advert-con (home page right sidebar), .nuomi-ad (home page left sidebar)
